title: Achieving the Potential: The Future of Federal e-Rulemaking
abstract:
A Report to Congress and the President
Committee on the Status and 
Future of Federal e-Rulemaking
Achieving 
the Potential
The Future of 
Federal e-Rulemaking
2008
When this report went to press, the following organizations had endorsed the interrelated 
recommendations for redesign and further development of the federal e-rulemaking system:  
Section of Administration Law & Regulatory Practice, ABA 
American Association of Law Libraries
American Library Association 
Association of Research Lib
